text: The men's triple jump event at the 1978 Commonwealth Games was held on 11 and 12 August at the Commonwealth Stadium in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Keith Connor '''' |Ian Campbell '''' |Aston Moore '''' |} ==Results== ===Qualification=== Held on 11 August Qualification: 15.50 m (Q) or at least 12 best (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
